column4: Hello everybody!  I'm new with Ubuntu.  I installed Compizconfig, but the settings are not sticking.  The only way it works is if I run the command compiz --replace.  However, once I log off or restart, Compiz still will not work.
and what exactly are you trying to do with compiz
hmm thats a little advanced for me honestly i stay away from compiz it is great for effects and what not but hard to configure properly sometime
